Text: ASME Continuing Education San Diegopst Dear Technical Professional Thank you for your previous interest in ASME Continuing Education Institute Short Courses If you do not wish to receive email updates from CEI any longer please type REMOVE in the subject area and return to We will be coming to San Diego CA on February Please join us at the Hilton San Diego Mission Valley for the following courses ASME Section VIII Division Repairs and Alterations of Boilers and Pressure Vessels Member NonMember ASME YM Geometric Dimensioning and Tolerancing Level Member NonMember ASME Section VIII Division Design and Fabrication of Pressure of Pressure Vessels Includes Repairs and Alterations Member NonMember ASME Section VIII Division Design and Fabrication of Pressure Vessels Member NonMember Tolerance StackUp Member NonMember To register for a course call THEASME or visit educationshortcocalendarhtm Dont forget to mention EM when you register COURSE LOCATION Hilton San Diego Mission Valley Camino del Rio South San Diego CA COURSE TIMES am pm Registration is from am am HOTEL RESERVATION HOTEL RATE Mention ASME to insure room rate If you would like more information about our Short Course program contact us at ASME Continuing Education Institute is upgrading its group email function for better service If you have received this email in error we apologize for the inconvenience To unsubscribe please send a blank email to
